index 2203d8120..35773845e 100644
--- a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1463.json

@@ -10,12 +10,19 @@
   "created_at": "2019-05-24T13:43:08Z",
   "github_updated_at": "2026-02-07T16:47:24Z",
   "body_snippet": "<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->\r\n\r\n## Context\r\nIn 1.77 new configuration fields for connections are introduced. Like Redirect clipboard.\r\nHow to enable inheritance for this on all existing connections at once?\r\n\r\n## Your Environment\r\n<!--- Include as many relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->\r\n* Version used: 1.77\r\n* Operating System and version (e.g. Windows 10 1709 x64): Windows 10 1809\r\n",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P3-enhancement",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-20",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "New config fields default to InheritX=false when loaded from older XML/SQL configs missing the attribute, breaking existing inherit-all setups"
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [
     {
       "id": "MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDQ5NTYzOTExNg==",
@@ -86,5 +93,5 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": false,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (claude): New config fields default to InheritX=false when loaded from older XML/SQL configs missing the attribute, breaking existing inherit-all setups\nApproach: In the deserializer, after loading all inheritance properties, detect missing XML attributes for new fields and default them to true when all other inheritance booleans are already true (i.e. the connection was using inherit-all before upgrade)"
 }

diff --git a/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableDeserializer.cs b/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableDeserializer.cs
index 9d66af653..dfa29fb52 100644
--- a/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableDeserializer.cs
+++ b/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableDeserializer.cs
@@ -243,6 +243,38 @@ namespace mRemoteNG.Config.Serializers.ConnectionSerializers.Sql
             connectionInfo.Inheritance.VNCProxyUsername = MiscTools.GetBooleanValue(dataRow["InheritVNCProxyUsername"]);
             connectionInfo.Inheritance.VNCSmartSizeMode = MiscTools.GetBooleanValue(dataRow["InheritVNCSmartSizeMode"]);
             connectionInfo.Inheritance.VNCViewOnly = MiscTools.GetBooleanValue(dataRow["InheritVNCViewOnly"]);
+
+            // Fix #1463: If the SQL schema predates new Inherit* columns, those columns
+            // won't exist. If every Inherit* column that IS present is true (inherit-all),
+            // extend inheritance to all properties including those from newer schema versions.
+            DefaultMissingInheritanceToTrue(dataRow, connectionInfo);
+        }
+
+        /// <summary>
+        /// When all Inherit* columns present in the DataRow are true, the user had
+        /// inherit-all. Extend that to all inheritance properties so fields added
+        /// in newer schema versions also inherit.
+        /// </summary>
+        private static void DefaultMissingInheritanceToTrue(DataRow dataRow, ConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
+        {
+            DataColumnCollection columns = dataRow.Table.Columns;
+            int inheritTrueCount = 0;
+
+            foreach (DataColumn col in columns)
+            {
+                if (!col.ColumnName.StartsWith("Inherit", StringComparison.Ordinal))
+                    continue;
+
+                if (MiscTools.GetBooleanValue(dataRow[col]))
+                    inheritTrueCount++;
+                else
+                    return; // At least one Inherit* column is false — not inherit-all.
+            }
+
+            if (inheritTrueCount == 0)
+                return;
+
+            connectionInfo.Inheritance.TurnOnInheritanceCompletely();
         }
 
         private string DecryptValue(string cipherText)
diff --git a/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs b/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs
index df64c5a75..a3f1dad9f 100644
--- a/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs
+++ b/mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionsDeserializer.cs
@@ -644,7 +644,43 @@ namespace mRemoteNG.Config.Serializers.ConnectionSerializers.Xml
                 Runtime.MessageCollector.AddMessage(MessageClass.ErrorMsg, string.Format(Language.GetConnectionInfoFromXmlFailed, connectionInfo.Name, ConnectionFileName, ex.Message));
             }
 
+            // Fix #1463: Older config files lack Inherit* attributes for fields added in newer versions.
+            // If every Inherit* attribute present in the XML is true, the user had "inherit all" —
+            // extend that to new properties missing from the older format.
+            DefaultMissingInheritanceToTrue(xmlnode, connectionInfo);
+
             return connectionInfo;
         }
+
+        /// <summary>
+        /// When all Inherit* attributes present in the XML node are true (inherit-all),
+        /// set all inheritance properties to true so that fields introduced in newer
+        /// config versions also inherit. Only acts when at least one Inherit* attribute
+        /// exists and none are false.
+        /// </summary>
+        private static void DefaultMissingInheritanceToTrue(XmlNode xmlNode, ConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
+        {
+            if (xmlNode?.Attributes == null)
+                return;
+
+            int inheritTrueCount = 0;
+
+            foreach (XmlAttribute attr in xmlNode.Attributes)
+            {
+                if (!attr.Name.StartsWith("Inherit", StringComparison.Ordinal))
+                    continue;
+
+                if (bool.TryParse(attr.Value, out bool val) && val)
+                    inheritTrueCount++;
+                else
+                    return; // At least one Inherit* is false — user is NOT using inherit-all.
+            }
+
+            if (inheritTrueCount == 0)
+                return;
+
+            // All present Inherit* attributes are true — extend to all properties.
+            connectionInfo.Inheritance.TurnOnInheritanceCompletely();
+        }
     }
 }
